data.comment: Today's match is followed by 11353 spectators.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 1, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
Malcom (Saint Petersburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg just outside Rostov's area.
Mathias Normann (Rostov) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 4, Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rostov's Eldor Shomurodov attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Corner awarded to Rostov.
In the minute 6, Eldor Shomurodov of Rostov is pulled up for offside.
Pavel Mamaev of Rostov smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Rostov will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 10, Saint Petersburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Rostov at Rostov Arena.
Throw-in for Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 12, Pavel Kukuyan awards the away team a throw-in.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Rostov's half.
Alexey Ionov for Rostov is whistled offside.
In the minute 17, Saint Petersburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Wilmar Barrios of Saint Petersburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Rostov at Rostov Arena.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in the half of Rostov.
In the minute 21, Malcom hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Saint Petersburg!
An attacking Saint Petersburg player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Rostov's Evgeni Chernov has been booked in Rostov-on-Don.
In the minute 24, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Sardar Azmoun.
Can Saint Petersburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rostov's half?
Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 35, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Saint Petersburg needs to be cautious. Rostov have an attacking throw-in.
Rostov are pushing forward but Pavel Mamaev's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rostov-on-Don.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a throw-in for Rostov, close to Saint Petersburg's area.
In the minute 39, Important block from the Saint Petersburg defence as Ivelin Popov fires in a strike for Rostov.
Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Sergey Pesjakov for Rostov is back on the field again.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Sergey Pesjakov is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In Rostov-on-Don Saint Petersburg drive forward through Malcom. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 43, Throw-in high up the field for Saint Petersburg in Rostov-on-Don.
Ball safe as Rostov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Rostov.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
In Rostov-on-Don Rostov attack through Maksim Osipenko. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Rostov Arena.
In the minute 46, Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 49, Pavel Kukuyan awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
Rostov to take a throw-in in Saint Petersburg territory.
Throw-in for Rostov close to the penalty box.
In the minute 51, Rostov are coming forward and Pavel Mamaev gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Baktiyor Zaynutdinov.
In the minute 52, Attention is being given to Rostovâ€™s Baktiyor Zaynutdinov and play has been suspended briefly.
Rostov needs to be cautious. Saint Petersburg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Rostov at Rostov Arena.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 55, Free kick Saint Petersburg.
Yaroslav Rakitskiy (Saint Petersburg) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
Saint Petersburg drive upfield and Sardar Azmoun gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Rostov defender.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at Rostov Arena.
Rostov's Pavel Mamaev misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Rostov in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Ivelin Popov (Rostov) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rostov push forward at Rostov Arena and Pavel Mamaev gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Saint Petersburg defence.
In the minute 60, Baktiyor Zaynutdinov (Rostov) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Rostov close to the penalty box.
Pavel Mamaev of Rostov gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 60, Pavel Kukuyan awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
Pavel Kukuyan signals a Rostov throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
In the minute 63, Pavel Kukuyan signals a throw-in for Rostov, close to Saint Petersburg's area.
Can Rostov capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint Petersburg's half?
Rostov have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 65, Saint Petersburg pushes forward through Sebastian Driussi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Saint Petersburg's Viacheslav Karavaev misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball safe as Rostov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 67, Rostov have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
In Rostov-on-Don, Eldor Shomurodov (Rostov) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rostov-on-Don.
In the minute 68, Throw-in Rostov.
The match at Rostov Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Sardar Azmoun, who is down injured.
Rostov's Baktiyor Zaynutdinov is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 69, Baktiyor Zaynutdinov is back on the pitch.
Sardar Azmoun is back on his feet again.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Sardar Azmoun is booked for the away team.
In Rostov-on-Don a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 73, Sebastian Driussi (Saint Petersburg) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Daniil Krugovoy.
Saint Petersburg make their second substitution with Aleksandr Yerokhin replacing Emiliano Rigoni.
The home team have replaced Pavel Mamaev with Kento Hashimoto. This is the first substitution made today by Valeri Karpin.
In the minute 74, Roman Eremenko is on a sub for Ivelin Popov for Rostov.
In Rostov-on-Don, Sebastian Driussi of Saint Petersburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Mathias Normann gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rostov.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Saint Petersburg in the half of Rostov.
Free kick Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 77, Rostov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Rostov capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
He's off! Yaroslav Rakitskiy is shown a second yellow card.
Rostov drives forward and Alexey Ionov gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 80, The away team replace Malcom with Danila Prokhin.
Rostov's Eldor Shomurodov is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 83, Rostov drive forward but Aleksey Kozlov is judged offside.
Mathias Normann of Rostov smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in high up the field for Rostov in Rostov-on-Don.
In the minute 85, Khoren Bayramyan is replacing Aleksey Kozlov for the home team.
The home team replace Eldor Shomurodov with David Tosevski.
Andrey Mostovoy is replacing Sardar Azmoun for the away team.
In the minute 86, Mathias Normann for Rostov drives towards goal at Rostov Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Saint Petersburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rostov's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Saint Petersburg close to the penalty box.
Dejan Lovren (Saint Petersburg) strikes at Rostov Arena but his header is cleared.
In the minute 87, Goal! Dejan Lovren extends Saint Petersburg lead to 0-2 with a header.
Douglas Santos with an assist there.
In the minute 89, Rostov's Evgeni Chernov gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Saint Petersburg defender.
Rostov are coming forward and Mathias Normann gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Rostov.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a throw-in for Rostov, close to Saint Petersburg's area.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Pavel Kukuyan awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick in a good position for Rostov!
That's full-time at Rostov Arena. The final score is 0-2.
Wilmar Barrios for Saint Petersburg has been booked by Pavel Kukuyan and receives a first yellow card.
